TopicTitle: Munar Lightweight - Apollo style mission for 3 with rover - 86 parts, 128T on the pad

Articles.Content:
As it says, a lightweight Apollo style mission for 3 kerbals complete with rover - missing a stage, but efficiency wins imho

This was inspired by this weeks Reddit challenge.

Spaceport link do check the instructions!

p.s. Rover can be a touch tippy - disable probe torque!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited August 13, 2013 by Slugy
Nice, I wouldn't have been able to do this in under 100 parts!

Cheers, the low part count just happened from trying to keep the weight low, I was surprised when I saw the count ...

Less is more!
